oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Richard A. Irwin to his family in Bethesda
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Richard A. Irwin (Irvin) was a solider from Bethesda, Williamson County (Tenn." Irwin, also listed as Irvin, was the adjutant of the 32nd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. He writes this letter from Tullahoma, Tennessee and describes the army being in better condition than when at Murfreesboro the previous winter.
